lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: John & Laura
lender.loan_because: We want to help

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: it is such a neat idea, and it helps the flow of economy. I got credit for Christmas, and it is just so cool!
lender.occupational_info: I go to school from eight to two, then I go to Nordic ski team until five or six. After that, I go home, eat dinner with my family, do my homework, and go to bed!

lender.name: Nikki
lender.loan_because: I like helping people & gettin' stuff done! Plus, I get a real sense of connection.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a local TV station.

lender.name: Max
lender.loan_because: We're all in this together, whether we realize it or not.
lender.occupational_info: I teach kids how the world works and do research into how to teach them more effectively.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I like helping people provide for themselves and their families
lender.occupational_info: I help agencies, states and Indian tribes to improve their air quality.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I am blessed so that I can be a blessing to others
lender.occupational_info: Companies and organizations hire my organization to sell their products, raise sponsorship funds or market their company

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: We all need to do our part to help others and to make the world we live in a better place for everyone. Yes we can!

lender.name: Shirley
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping those that are willing to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I supervise a manufacturing facility that produces dimension lumber for sale throughout the world

lender.name: BnTzmimi
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of paying it forward for all of the blessing I have.
lender.occupational_info: helping children

lender.name: Kirsten
lender.loan_because: it's such a great feeling!
lender.occupational_info: I provide anesthesia to surgery patients

lender.name: diana mccain
lender.loan_because: These people are my brothers and sisters!
lender.occupational_info: I am the director of an adult education program that serves 6 towns. We offer high school diploma, college preparation and lots of art, computer, dance, language and cooking classes for adults.

lender.name: Vivien
lender.loan_because: I'm honoring my parents who always loved the entrepreneurial spirit and cared about the world. Thank you Kiva for showing that everyone can and should help others.
lender.occupational_info: I coordinate a parent program for families with young children.

lender.name: Rocky & Victoria
lender.loan_because: it has been our passion to help others. Rocky passed away, and I have been continuing our commitment to humanitarian causes.
lender.occupational_info: Currently, I run a charity program for special needs children in the Texas while attending nursing school.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: it is a tangible way to make a difference with people who I would not otherwise be able to help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Sr. Manager with a big four accounting firm and I help my clients solve their information technology business problems.

lender.name: Krista
lender.loan_because: I believe in sustainable development and social justice with all of my heart.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying Social Work and Spanish at Pacific Lutheran University in Washington state. Someday, I hope to work with international public health issues and work toward positive change in the world.

lender.name: Sarah & Ted
lender.occupation: High School English Teacher and a School Counselor

lender.name: Gregory
lender.loan_because: I desire to give back to others what God has given me. I am blessed with so much: 5 children, a wounderful wife and small internet business. It's my small way to say thank you.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses to flourish on the internet by 1) making sure that they are seen in the top 3 positions of Google and 2) that their website is profitable.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I was given Kiva as a gift....what a great way to make a difference in someone's life!
lender.occupational_info: I work as a teacher for Special Education students. I am also currently attending college to get my Master's Degree in Special Education.

lender.name: Sam and Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: God is good and people are beautiful
lender.occupational_info: Sam is an engineer who works with drinking water systems (making sure they stay or become clean and safe). Elizabeth paints pictures and designs for businesses.

lender.name: catherine
lender.loan_because: I want to encourage people to follow their dreams.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: World peace will only be achieved by people helping people. I hope my small contributions will be one step towards facilitating global dialogue and mutual understanding.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a global accounting firm as an auditor, which means I ensure that my clients' accounting records are accurate and that the financial statements that it generates (which are provided to banks, the public, and stockholders) are fairly stated.

lender.name: Paola
lender.loan_because: I admire entrepreneurs, it takes a lot of risk and courage to start a business, I think anyone should be able to follow their dream and I want to support them.

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: Kiva is what globalization should be about.
lender.occupational_info: I tend the land sustainably while satisfying the needs of people.

lender.name: Max
lender.loan_because: I want to give back to my world community.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a university.

lender.name: Dirk
lender.loan_because: this is a great way to help people who want to help themselves. The money is almost better than a donation as it will be used over and over again to help people better their lives.

lender.name: Richardson-De Almeida's
lender.loan_because: We want to help others help themselves!
lender.occupational_info: We construct, repair, renovate and sell commercial and residential real estate.

lender.name: Hans
lender.loan_because: I loan because I believe in enabling folks to meet their needs and to pursue their dreams. By the same token, I loan with the expectation that my funds will be used wisely and repaid, so that my funds may then in turn, be re-loaned to others in need and seeking to pursue their dreams too.

lender.name: Abigail
lender.loan_because: freedom requires a bit of capital.
lender.occupational_info: Working with a team of software developers to improve access to information

lender.name: Truett
lender.loan_because: I received a great gift. A Kiva credit to loan.
lender.occupational_info: Counsel people to help solve their problems.

lender.name: Matthew Diller
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a sustainable and renewable application of my limited funds for sharing. I am grateful for the opportunity to participate. What a wonderful engagement of technology, this Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I teach eight and nine year old children (third grade elementary school). I teach several subjects including education for sustainability.

lender.name: Frederico
lender.whereabouts: S D Rana S D Rana

lender.name: Gerry and Cheryl
lender.loan_because: I want to help on a personal basis.
lender.occupational_info: I repair large Mining Equipment.

lender.name: Lora
lender.loan_because: I believe that severe poverty is the most pressing global issue of our time. I believe that I can make a difference by contributing to the economic activities and possibilities for entreprenuers working to get out of poverty.

lender.name: Coach Alexia Vernon
lender.loan_because: It enables me to leverage the resources in my life to make an impact in the lives of others. And honestly, it's just too darn easy and cheap not to!!!
lender.occupational_info: I empower individuals, businesses, and communities to set aggressive and achievable goals and to design corresponding, innovative action plans to bridge the gap from where they are to where they want to be.

lender.name: Roy
lender.loan_because: Getting started with 2007 Christmas Gift Certificate. Plan to add more with time.
lender.occupational_info: I drive a truck to get away from home and working too hard. It is a way to rest up for me. I will be 80 in March and still working at life hard. Work keeps you young.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: its needed. The value and utility of money is worth so much more to those that really need it.
lender.occupational_info: I work helping the people of my community here in the US.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people with the means to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I work in a large company, in the department that goes to the market and tries to get the company loans.

lender.name: Michael A. Thompson
lender.loan_because: Direct loans to people have been shown to be more effective then out right aid to their governments.
lender.occupational_info: In simple terms I allocate resources and create new businesses.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: Some things are more important than money and material things.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time university student, studying History.

lender.name: Eva J
lender.loan_because: We all need a helping hand sometime. i love to see people want to get ahead to support themselves /family with dignity. There's dignity in work.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a retired R.N, grandma who helps were i can with grandkids , church & community activities

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: There are so many people less fortunate than I who need help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Student.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I've had the good fortune of opportunity. I believe that's a fortune that everyone should have.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I am in the grateful position to be able to.
lender.occupational_info: I'm the one with the less serious look on his face...

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: to help change the world
lender.occupational_info: I help design and manufacture medical devices

lender.name: Marika
lender.loan_because: I think other people in this world shouldn't be ignored. They should be helped with problems, know others around the world, and be educated just as much as other people. We should all be treated equally.
lender.occupational_info: Since I am just 13, I don't have a real job. But I always have wanted to become a famous fashion designer. I sew constantly and draw many dress creations. I sing because I am in Bel Canto Choirs. It is mainly all singing, but we've performed musicals before.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: ...I like helping people in whatever way that I can, and Kiva makes it easy to extend assistance to those outside of the neighborhood.
lender.occupational_info: ...I'm a college student, but I'm very active in dance, knitting, academic endeavors, and my family (of course).

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: It feels right to provide some assistance to those who are trying to improve their own lives and the lives of their families.

lender.name: Ray
lender.loan_because: I am interested in loaning to people who need money to better their lives.

lender.name: David
lender.occupational_info: I interpret for two deaf children at their school.

lender.name: Ric
lender.occupational_info: See my Google website.

lender.name: Donna and Karsten
lender.loan_because: We share because we can. It is our obligation as fortunate people to help others. We specifically want to help women and their children around the world.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference for people who need a little bit of monetary assistance to improve their lives on their own initiative.
lender.occupational_info: Prior to staying at home to raise my son, I interpreted between patients who speak Spanish and doctors who speak English.

lender.name: Dave & Beth
lender.loan_because: This is a great idea

lender.name: RebJonLiz
lender.loan_because: My Uncle and Aunt gave me some money

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: there are millions of independent, ambitious, and intelligent entrepreneurs all over the world who have ideas for their own projects to better their lives. All they need is a small loan to put these ideas into action.
lender.occupational_info: I study international business and economics at Dickinson College

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Nan & Brian
lender.loan_because: This seems to be the best and most productive way to really make a connection through out the world. We are thinking globally!!!
lender.occupational_info: I teach preschoolers,age 3-5 who live below the United States poverty level.Many of the families in my program come from South America or Mexico.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: Our future is bound up together.

lender.name: ShanDevKel
lender.loan_because: My Uncle and Aunt gave me some money.

lender.name: R&J
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: AidLiJulDecGab
lender.loan_because: Our Uncle and Aunt gave us some money
lender.occupational_info: We are good at silly-billying.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I feel like it is my own form of income redistribution. Many people at the lowest income levels of society get hurt by their countries politics and quite simply it is not their fault. So I want to help in my own way.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at University of British Columbia and I own an Event Planning company.

lender.name: Melissa Pogue
lender.loan_because: I care about others & God asks me to.
lender.occupational_info: Hardworking mom of 3.

lender.name: tuan
lender.loan_because: for the price of a few drinks, someone can have a chance at a better life. so, the question is why not?

lender.name: Paul & Angela
lender.loan_because: Like the concept and am glad being able to help!

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I want to use what I can to help others so that they might have a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I teach middle school science in an economically disadvantaged part of the USA to increase the chances that these young students might go on to college and better their place in life,

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: it feels like the right thing to do - to help others who are less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large company on a specific computer system keeping it up-to-date and helping others who are having problems

lender.name: Michael & Tina
lender.loan_because: We are flowers of one garden.

lender.name: Toshikazu
lender.loan_because: My opinion is "Money is used for life to good thing not savings.".

lender.name: smiling lion - tammalee
lender.loan_because: It's contagious compassion - Pass it on!

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to help. That is why I am in Health Care. Life has been very good to me and I would like to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I help people see the world around them by examining their eyes, making sure they are healthy, medicating them if needed and getting vision as clear as possible.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I like to do my part to help others.

lender.name: Erika
lender.loan_because: I should. I am blessed with a job, a home, and I should be helping those who are striving for the same things in a place where those things are twice as hard to come by.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children how to read and write.

lender.name: jennifer
lender.loan_because: I see people and humanity not borders and geography.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student working towards my Graduate degree in Counseling Psychology.

lender.name: Tanvir
lender.loan_because: We are a small community group and have not access to local funds because we are in a remote community.
lender.occupational_info: An entreprenuer group.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: it will reduce poverty. It will improve lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am attending law school.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: it is the least I can do. Everyone needs a little assitance sometimes, and I am glad I am able to help out.

lender.name: Evan
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place for all.
lender.occupational_info: I attend Jesuit High School in California

lender.name: Chris / Jennifer
lender.loan_because: We like to give people the opportunity to make their dreams come true.

lender.name: Dallas
lender.loan_because: They don't want handouts, they want opportunity.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: Life has been very good for me, and I know it's largly because of my good fortune to be born and raised in the USA, How can you not pass some of that on?
lender.occupational_info: I'm a retired civil servant.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I like the idea that I can actually see what is happening with the money I have donated (loaned). Even though it isn't a lot of money I do feel I'm making a difference for at least one other person in the world.

lender.name: Naomi
lender.loan_because: A loan is a gift that keeps on giving--with one small wad of seemingly insignificant cash, a person can help a tremendous number of their fellow humans. Empowering people a beautiful thing.

lender.name: Jackie
lender.loan_because: I really believe in the ability of people to improve their own lives, but I believe just as strongly that everyone needs and deserves help and support to do that.
lender.occupational_info: I am trained as a social worker with a focus in community development. I get excited by what happens when people come together to pool their resources -- financial, psychological, emotional, spiritual, and physical.

lender.name: Bob & cheryl
lender.loan_because: Kiva is wonderful opportunity to reach out and help other self employed people throughout the entire world.
lender.occupational_info: My wife Cheryl and I own a cleaning company located in Seattle Washington.

lender.name: John
lender.occupational_info: What is unique about my work is that during the winter time I drive in the artic where the temp. gets down to -55. There are not any roads there so we drive on frozen lakes instead.

lender.name: Jeffrey & Nicole
lender.loan_because: it is important to help every person achieve their goals & dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Help people invest their money in order to realize their dreams.

lender.name: ECO
lender.loan_because: we have all been given countless opportunities in life and it is time we helped to provide opportunities for those less fortunate and for the good of the earth.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of energetic and motivated college students who meet weekly to work on projects to address environmental well-being both on our campus and beyond.

lender.name: Aleks
lender.loan_because: Nothing is more exiting than seeing people succeed in their pursuit for better life. They are not only helping themselves, the whole society around them will benefit. Im more than happy to be just a small resting place in their journey.
lender.occupational_info: Building energy efficient buildings for the future.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good to make a small contribution that has a big impact on someone else's life.
lender.occupational_info: I work to improve the quality of life and natural environment of urban areas.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: It is such a small amount for me, but can mean so much for someone else. So why not?
lender.occupational_info: I am a researcher studying how information and communication technology can improve healthcare.

lender.name: Ruth
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lender.name: Leanna
lender.loan_because: I'm a single mother. I've had to decide what we needed more - diapers or food. Life can be difficult no matter where you live, but through the goodness of people it can be made just a little bit easier.
lender.occupational_info: I am in sales. I consult with companies to find business solutions that will help enhance their bottom lines.

lender.name: Marcel V.
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Hans en Corine
lender.loan_because: we want to share our well-being
lender.occupational_info: Hans was responsible for the sale of trucks in several European countries. Corine makes flower decorations for churches and wedding-parties.

lender.name: Sherron
lender.loan_because: Wow! what a wonderful feeling to help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of sick children in a major NYC hospital

lender.name: Paul and Sue
lender.loan_because: We got help from others to get where we are. Giving feels good.
lender.occupational_info: We teach independence skills to people with vision problems.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Brent & Kelly
lender.occupation: Brent:IT Project Leader, Kelly: Massage Therapist
lender.loan_because: So others may realize their own personal and economic goals.
lender.occupational_info: Brent: I work with computer systems. Kelly: I own my own Massage Therapy Business.

lender.name: Michael
lender.occupational_info: I manage the IT department for a 15 branch library system in metro Atlanta.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can. Something as small as $25 is two glasses of wine in some restaurants and is gone in minutes. $25 here and you can help change someone's life. Just do SOMETHING.
lender.occupational_info: I organize people, resources, plan and implement to get a task done.

lender.name: Maj
lender.loan_because: It works!

lender.name: Jody
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with a good job and I feel it's my responsibility to pass my good fortune onto those who are in need
lender.occupational_info: I handle routine legal issues that come into our office that don't require a lawyer's time.

lender.name: Rhonda
lender.loan_because: I can and I like to help people
lender.occupational_info: I help dispense medicine in a hospital

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: it's more fun than borrowing...

lender.name: Stu and Joan
lender.loan_because: I want to help other s
lender.occupational_info: business psychologist

lender.name: frederick
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Vulsteke-Muylle
lender.loan_because: it's a moral obligation that people who can afford it, share some money to people who really need it.
lender.occupational_info: My work consists in ICT network support and programming

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: It's an easy way to give others the means to be successful, and I have more than I need - why not share it with someone who does not?

lender.name: Virginia
lender.occupation: executive director of a religious nonprofit

lender.name: Martine
lender.loan_because: I believe that entrepreneurship and the accessibility to affordable money to grow the business is the way forward to get out of poverty
lender.occupational_info:
I work for IICD, a non-profit foundation that specialises in information and communication technology (ICT) as a tool for development.
IICD creates practical and sustainable solutions using both modern media (such as computers, Internet, email and multimedia) and traditional media (such as radio and television) to connect people and enable them to benefit from ICT, thereby contributing to the Millenium Development Goals.
My own role as officer Knowledge sharing is to work with the local ICT4D networks in Zambia and Ghana and to ensure knowledge sharing between local partners and countries

lender.name: Brandon and Sarah
lender.loan_because: We wish to provide opportunity and resources to those with the vision and desire to provide goods and services to their community and to establish themselves socially and financially.
lender.occupational_info:
Brandon works in technology for an organization committed to releasing children from poverty around the world in the name of Jesus.
Sarah works as a project manager designing programs to assist the elderly living in Colorado Springs, CO.

lender.name: EAF
lender.loan_because: I am trying to learn compassion, equality and self awareness in a bigger world. My parents are also trying to help me understand the difference between a hand out and a hand up.
lender.occupational_info: I learn a lot, but recess and art are my favorites. This experience is to teach me about being a good global citizen. My parents say, "Be a participant, not an observer."

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel connected with the world...and, it makes me smile!
lender.occupational_info: I am a speech writer.

lender.name: Rosie/Dr. Mike
lender.loan_because: we believe in giving people an opportunity to better themselves and Kiva offers us that chance. My employer gave me the opportunity to pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I am a dental hygienist working for a wonderful dentist that is committed to his patients and staff.

lender.name: Jared & David
lender.loan_because: cash it's not just for breakfast anymore, share !
lender.occupational_info: A dynamic Father Son duo working to help the planet to breathe

lender.name: Matt and Jen
lender.occupational_info: We are both performers and writers (theater/film/television) and we own a bar in Brooklyn, NY.

lender.name: Anastasia
lender.loan_because: It's so easy! It just feels so good!

lender.name: Percy Gorham
lender.loan_because: I loan because I believe it is important to help fund other people's goals, great ideas, realistic dreams, or profitable plans.
lender.occupational_info: I am the author of several small books that are available via the internet such as Amazon, Barnes & Noble, Books A Million, Target.com, and other websites that sell & distribute online books.

lender.name: Scot & Kristin H.
lender.loan_because: we have been blessed with resources, so we can use that to bless others.
lender.occupational_info: I review income, credit and risk to see if a customer should be approved for a home loan.

lender.name: Mel
lender.loan_because: I feel strongly that everyone can do Something to help those less fortunate. It makes me feel so good when I know my small contribution can go so far.
lender.occupational_info: I own a yoga studio and I teach yoga. I spend my days making people feel good. For some I am teaching them to stand on their hands for others I am simply giving them a place to relax and breath.

lender.name: Erik
lender.loan_because:
"From those who have been given much, much will be expected."
-- John F. Kennedy

lender.name: Matt
lender.occupational_info: I write commercials that go on TV.

lender.name: DAVID
lender.loan_because: I'm able to.

lender.name: Nils
lender.loan_because: People who have the courage to step up need to be given the opportunity to succeed! This is an amazing way to have a positive impact on local issues from a society that is largely ignorant of its contribution to poverty around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am part of the missing link between food consumers and farmers who grow sustainable food crops. Through this work people are given the opportunity to be more conscientious about their food, their health and their greater community.

lender.name: janet
lender.loan_because: It's my way of giving back for having such a blessed life. Some day I will volunteer on site. Until then, the least I can do is send money.
lender.occupational_info: I have been a nurse since 1977 and worked in a variety of fields such as coronary care, post surgical recovery, ob/gyn, and emergency care. The last 20 years was in hospital administration in a 25 bed hospital. I now dedicate my time volunteering for various causes.

lender.name: Graham
lender.loan_because: This is a direct, personal way of sharing what I have wtih people who too have dreams and ambitions
lender.occupational_info: I am an Assistant Superintendent of Education in a school district in Winnipeg.

lender.name: BoeasGive
lender.loan_because: I believe we are blessed to be a blessing to others.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because:
I feel compelled to give something back, but to do so in a way that empowers people to meet their family's needs. A "hand out" to those who are unable to do for themselves; A "hand up" for those who can.
God bless those who developed Kiva and may God bless those whom it helps.
lender.occupational_info: We try to help people to be successful in their businesses so that they can feed their families, educate their children and retire happily.

lender.name: Marlene
lender.loan_because: I think the true meaning and value in life can be found by giving your time, resources, love, listening and a warm smile. I try to leave a place better than I found it.
lender.occupational_info: Procurement with consideration for social and environmental responsibility.

lender.name: Brand
lender.loan_because: It's possible and it's a simple and effective way to help people improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I talk a lot.

lender.name: Nina
lender.loan_because: Because I can!

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to make opportunities available to people that really need it.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: We human beings have to help each other out at the grass roots level. We can't depend on governments or the corporate world.

lender.name: Slayer
lender.loan_because: I am able to reach, share and help without boundaries.
lender.occupational_info: Every Bit Counts.

lender.name: Therese
lender.loan_because: I feel the money will make a big difference to someone.
lender.occupational_info: I sell advertising in magazines, travel guides and association directories.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I write music for movies.

lender.name: Duncan and Catherine
lender.loan_because: We are blessed to have more than we really need.
lender.occupational_info: I help people who have a mental illness. We help them get housing, benefits, medical care, and support.

lender.name: jill
lender.loan_because: i am fortunate that i have a good job and am able to support myself, which is very meaningful to me and something in which i take great pride. if i can help someone make a difference in their lives by empowering them with the means to support themselves and their family, then that is a great gift i can give.
lender.occupational_info: i am a teacher. i teach boys aged 9-11. they are a handful!! but i love what i do!!

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: This is one way I can affect change and help someone whom I will never meet and help them help themselves. The directness of the Kiva connection puts a real face on the need and the progress your help will do to help others.

lender.name: Marti
lender.loan_because: We are blessed to be a blessing to others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach and minister to women with a desire to help them live fulfilled, happy lives in Christ.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.occupation: teacher & partner of a family website
lender.loan_because: I feel very blessed in my life and I enjoy sharing that with others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to students in grades kindergarten through 6th who have a first language other than English. I am also a partner/owner of our family website BabyNames.com.

lender.name: Graham Henderson
lender.loan_because: I believe there is value in learning to take care of yourself and want others to learn that. Nothing is learned from free.
lender.occupational_info: I provide a service in exchange for payment. That service is something that would take time and effort for the customer, so he pays me to do the work for him.

lender.name: Dunbar Family
lender.loan_because: we want to help others around the world build a prosperous life and reach their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Mike (father) sells telecommunications (phone systems) and Angie (mother) sells houses. Kids are in school.

lender.name: Open Hand
lender.loan_because: We are lucky to have more than we need. We want to help others who are working hard to improve their lot in life and support their families.

lender.name: Tina
lender.loan_because: I believe in the saying many hands make light work and if everyone just gives a little many people will benefit as a collective.

lender.name: Yossi
lender.loan_because: I want to improve the life of others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a high school student.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of microloans.
lender.occupational_info: I make web sites easier to use.

lender.name: Walter
lender.loan_because: I love Jesus Christ and want to help people.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I've been incredibly lucky and I'm happy to have the opportunity to help someone else find success.
lender.occupational_info: I write for scripts for television and feature films. I also write tv, radio, and print advertising.

lender.name: Lee
lender.occupational_info: I

lender.name: Marty et al
lender.loan_because: We are fortunate enough to be able to.

lender.name: Birch
lender.loan_because: I am a world citizen.
lender.occupational_info: I help develop progressive policy solutions to problems facing the the Rocky Mountain West.

lender.name: Gregory
lender.loan_because: I can afford to share. I feel that engaging in an effort like Kiva is the most important action I can act.
lender.occupational_info: I am a therapist that works with people needing wheelchairs. I work in the USA but have volunteered many times in other regions of the world working to provide wheelchairs to disabled in those regions.

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: We are all responsible for one another in our global community. A loan is a helping hand for someone to help themselves not a handout to enable poverty to continue.
lender.occupational_info: I worked with a library of electronic documents on a computer. It is the same principle as a physical library which handles books.

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: I started my business with $1000 cash advance on a credit card -- and 20 years of hard work. Now I employ 12 people. I see Kiva as a way to give others a similar opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I own a mail-order catalog company that sells gifts.

lender.name: Jeneve
lender.loan_because: 25 dollars may not seem like a lot of money to me but to some people it is the difference between being able to feed and clothe their children.
lender.occupational_info: The most important job a woman will ever have is the job of raising their children.

lender.name: Lisa & Ellen
lender.loan_because: We want to help improve the lives of women in this world.

lender.name: Thea
lender.loan_because: my religious beliefs demand that I help make the world a more just place. And what is better than helping others help themselves?
lender.occupational_info: Hands-on learning is the only way....SCIENCE ROCKS!!!!

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: Loaning is a way of enabling another person to help themselves which is more valuable than just giving a one-time donation of money. Through loaning, I am also able to re-loan the money to someone else once it is paid back.
lender.occupational_info: I design teaching programs that help workers to do their jobs better. In my liesure time I like to read, hike, kayak, dance and play the jembe.

lender.name: Tim & Kaiya
lender.loan_because:
It's an opportunity to teach my daughter about sharing, and doing it in a way that opens her eyes and heart to the world around her.
Special thanks to my future sister-in-law for sharing KIVA with us, and getting us started.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I like this model of microfinance.
lender.occupational_info: I try to convince institutional investors like pension funds and fund managers to care about environmental, social and governance issues.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: to spread peace
lender.occupational_info: work on welding machines

lender.name: Maryam
lender.loan_because: one way we can be grateful for the opportunities which lead to our prosperity is by using those means to provide opportunities to others to advance themselves, their families and communities.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a non-governmental organization at the United Nations in New York, and I write reports and letters, attend meetings and organize and travel to training seminars in different parts of the world.

lender.name: Ruth
lender.loan_because: How not?

lender.name: gene
lender.loan_because: for the chance that it may help..and for those in my photo
lender.occupational_info: yoga teacher

lender.name: Ed
lender.loan_because: I see all these people as my family. And that's what I taught for 34 years. I loan to family members.

lender.name: Larry
lender.occupational_info: Home builder, carpenter

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I want other people to have the chance to develop their abilities just like I had the chance to learn piano an make it my living.
lender.occupational_info: I have played the piano since I was 7 and learned to compose, record and sell my CDs around the world. I also teach people tp play the piano.

lender.name: Alyson
lender.loan_because: The opportunity was given to me and it is amazing to be able to give in this way. We're all in this together.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can. Through the accident of birth, I live a very privileged life. I would like to share some of my good fortune with someone else.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I have a number of rental properties, acquired one at a time over many years. Over the years we were buying or building the properties, we both worked at full-time jobs, raised our family, and I went to school. We no longer have to work so hard. Our children have grown into happy, thoughtful adults and the business we started pays our bills. Life is very good!!

lender.name: Liz and Steve
lender.loan_because: people in other countries work so hard to put food on the table, whereas in my country, we waste so much. Contributing through Kiva to help them achieve self-sufficiency in the face of often overwhelming odds is the least we can do.

lender.name: Young Family
lender.loan_because: We believe that with abundance comes the responsibility and privilege to share it.
lender.occupational_info: Heather is a full-time mom and Jim manages a group of designers in a small company that imports furniture and other products for import by big US retailers.

lender.name: Lawrence
lender.loan_because: It will give someone a chance to build a business and provide for their family.
lender.occupational_info: I just retired from a small company we started 28 years ago to design and manufacture custom control systems. Over the years, we designed and built equipment for many different industral catagories.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: The need is there and I can help.

lender.name: Samantha
lender.loan_because: I have studied alot about the positive impacts micro-credit schemes can make to help empower people to work their own way out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an International Development charity. I work primarily with supporters of the charity, building relations with them with the aim that they will do more and give more to fight poverty around the world.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: People of the world must begin to understand that we create all of our problems and that only we can change the world for the better.

lender.name: Your Healthy Home
lender.loan_because: I Believe that we can save humanity 1 person at a time
lender.occupational_info: I own a small organic house cleaning business

lender.name: Hannah
lender.loan_because: i want to help people everywhere be successful!

lender.name: Leah
lender.loan_because: I was once homeless and penniless with a baby on the way. With one helping hand I was able to start my own restaurant and work my way out of bankruptcy. I will always be grateful for that and wish to pass on to others that small helping hand in the hope that they may also find success through their efforts.
lender.occupational_info: I am a single mother to 4 sons. I have an Italian restaurant which serves pasta, pizza and seafood.

lender.name: Kassandra
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: Each of us can make a difference

lender.name: Sally
lender.loan_because: I want to share our good fortune with others and I value autonomy, energy and connectedness.
lender.occupational_info: I care for my young daughter. I'm trained as a lawyer and used to work in court a lot. Being a mother is harder. And lots more fun.

lender.name: Jennis
lender.loan_because: Sponsoring those with spirit, intelligence and drive is a good move!
lender.occupational_info: I work for an organization that helps people find jobs. In my position, I help to promote my organization to employers who are looking to hire new workers.
